name: Find The Light (Cracked Light Productions)
description:
This was my first attempt at creating a game in Unreal Engine and Because of such a short amount of time to complete the project I wasn't able to put in everything I wanted but it did help keep me on track of what was most important in the development of such a game.

After falling down a large hole in the ground you find yourself at the entrance to an entire cave system that get narrower the farther you move in , right at the beginning you realize that you are not alone down here. Try and get to the Tree of Light Alive.
